heroSubtitle: A playful emotional type quiz for young people. Not a diagnosis, just a lighter way to understand yourself.
howItWorksBody: Answer a few short questions about how you usually feel and react. You’ll get a gentle "Glowtype" description at the end.
whatItIsBody: Glowtype is not medical advice or a diagnosis. It’s a small reflection tool to help you put words to your inner world.
safetyPreviewBody: You don’t need an account. We avoid ad tracking and try to keep what you share as private as reasonably possible.
